Docs.summary: Extensions to that enable access to IIS features.

<Extension()> Public Function GetIISServerVariable (context As HttpContext, variableName As String) As String
static member GetIISServerVariable : Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext * string -> string

Docs.param: The http context for the request.
Docs.summary: Gets the value of a server variable for the current request.
Docs.returns: null if the feature does not support the feature. May return null or empty if the variable does not exist or is not set.
Docs.remarks: For a list of common server variables available in IIS, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=52471.
